content: Lukaku and Lautaro Martinez are both top-class forwards who have been in superb form recently, so it will definitely be exciting to watch them in the Champions League. They have formed a lethal partnership and have been key to Inter's success in recent years, and they will be looking to continue their impressive form in the Champions League. Additionally, Inter has a strong and balanced team, which will make them a difficult opponent for any team in the tournament. So, it promises to be an exciting competition, and it will be interesting to see how Inter performs in their group matches and beyond.
